titleStmt.title: The serpents subtilty discovered, or a true relation of what passed in the cathedrall church of Rochester, between divers ministers and Richard Coppin, to prevent credulity to the false representation of the said discourse published by the said R. Coppin from Maidstone goale. / By Walter Rosewell minister of Chatham in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Rosewell, Walter.

titleStmt.title: The serpents subtilty discovered, or a true relation of what passed in the cathedrall church of Rochester, between divers ministers and Richard Coppin, to prevent credulity to the false representation of the said discourse published by the said R. Coppin from Maidstone goale. / By Walter Rosewell minister of Chatham in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Rosewell, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Jos. Cranford, at the Kings Head in St Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to Coppin, Richard. Blow at the serpent. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
